alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 31 at 11:54AM AKST until January 04 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Large snow drifts can form. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.
